name: Sundried Tomato & Basil Artisan Crackers
description: Elevate your snacking experience with our Sundried Tomato & Basil Artisan Crackers. Handcrafted in small batches, these crispy crackers blend sun-ripened tomatoes with fragrant basil for a burst of Mediterranean flavor in every bite. Perfect for pairing with cheeses, dips, or enjoying solo, each cracker offers a satisfying crunch and a savory, herby aroma. Made with non-GMO ingredients and olive oil, they’re a delicious, wholesome treat for gatherings or everyday enjoyment.

attributes.ingredients: Wheat flour, sundried tomato, basil, olive oil, sea salt, yeast
attributes.allergens: Contains wheat; may contain traces of sesame and nuts
